Significant Papers

Publication commentary

  • “Multi-Node Multi-GPU Datalog” (pdf) AR Shovon, Y Sun, T Gilray, K Micinski, S Kumar. ICS ‘25

  • “Datalog with First-Class Facts.” (pdf) T Gilray, A Sahebolamri, Y Sun, S Kunapaneni, S Kumar, K Micinski. VLDB ‘25

  • “Optimizing Datalog for the GPU” (pdf) Y Sun, AR Shovon, T Gilray, S Kumar, K Micinski. ASPLOS ‘25

  • “Column-Oriented Datalog on the GPU” (pdf) Y Sun, S Kumar, T Gilray, K Micinski. AAAI ‘25

  • “Assemblage: Automatic Binary Dataset Construction for Machine Learning” (pdf) C Liu, R Saul, Y Sun, E Raff, M Fuchs, TS Pantano, J Holt, K Micinski. NeurIPS ‘24 (Datasets and Benchmarks track)

  • “Bring your own data structures to datalog” (pdf) A Sahebolamri, L Barrett, S Moore, K Micinski. OOPSLA ‘23. ⭐ Distinguished Paper Award

  • “Towards Iterative Relational Algebra on the GPU” (pdf). AR Shovon, T Gilray, K Micinski, S Kumar. USENIX ATC ‘23.

  • “Optimizing the Bruck Algorithm for Non-Uniform all-to-all Communication” (pdf). K Fan, T Gilray, V Pascucci, X Huang, K Micinski, S Kumar. HPDC ‘22

  • “Seamless Deductive Inference via Macros” (pdf) A Sahebolamri, T Gilray, K Micinski. CC ‘22

  • “Compiling Data-Parallel Datalog” (pdf) T Gilray, S Kumar, K Micinski CC ‘21

  • “Abstracting Faceted Execution” (pdf) K Micinski, D Darais, T Gilray. CSF ‘20

  • “An Observational Investigation of Reverse Engineers’ Processes” (pdf) D Votipka, S Rabin, K Micinski, JS Foster, ML Mazurek. USENIX ‘20
